relation: They have many activities to participate in. Whether your in sports or the artistic type, there is always something to pass the time with.
Food isn't a problem. The different restaurants that are established there make dinning on campus different every day.
The dorm life is never boring. Either with a roommate or not, everyone has a friendly neighbor. The living conditions make you feel like you're the king/queen of your own castle.
The academic program is fair just like any other college, but hard work and dedication will make the workload seem easier.
Get to know the recruiters , they can be your best friends when it comes to financial aid and scheduling.

Texas A&M Int. University is one of the most friendly campus' that I have visited. It is a gem stone in it's own making to help students shine. Their facility is very efficient and nothing will stop them from getting the most benefits for you.
pageTitle: Texas A & M International University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Young-Gun12 07/14/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 64 Categories Comments Campus Safety The one thing this university has is safety. Campus police is top of every rule. Keep an eye out for them they can be your best friend or foe. Greek Life Don't think this like the movies, the university is new to the Greek life so it is in its growing stage but they do have a lot of thing for its members. Clubs and Activities There are a few clubs for students they are a lot of fun some hold concerts while others have midnight paintball, scavenger hunts and other activities for its members. Great for these types of students Great for students who want to a great education at a low price. A laid back student who doesn't mind having some fun from time to time.
